item.title: Design Docs Best Practices
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: Each project deserves careful thought on the design and architecture of the solution. This is something that should be done at the start of projects and for each major revision. One tool for design and architecting is to write a design doc for each major revision.
